info.name: quora black&red
info.description: a black and red version of quora based on Quora.com - Black by lahratla, see changelog for changes. in the future i will remove the global selector and change many of the white elements to red
info.additionalInfo:
2
___
*the related questions sidebar now has a dark background
*the top stories section now has a dark background
*some buttons are now much more legible
*announcements now have black backgrounds
1
___
*removed whitespace
*improved comments to impact performance less
*styling is now applied more consistently
*optimised code
*global selectors have been removed which should improve performance
0
___
*some unnecessary "!important" tags removed
*added in more specific styling
*applied borders to some elements
*removed some ads, now you can see more in your feed
*removed some padding from elements
*changed black to the shorter hand form #000
